posts.post_content:
Looking at the back the left side is McIntyre the right side is Ed Killian portrait.
There is a recurring print flaw found on some killian portraits and this split back has that flaw.

$1100 for the McIntyre only paypal f&f shipping and insurance included or both a PSA 4 Killian with the same back flaw and McIntyre $1300 f&f.
